front.title: IEEE Standard Specifications for Public-Key Cryptography - Amendment 1: Additional Techniques

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Amendment to IEEE Std 1363-2000, this standard specifies additional public-key cryptographic techniques beyond those in IEEE Std 1363-2000. It is intended to be merged with IEEE Std 1363-2000 during future revisions.
